name: Best R&B & Soul Albums - Top 100 Latest & Greatest New Record Music Charts & Hit Song Lists, Encyclopedia & Reviews
name_original: Best R&B & Soul Albums - Top 100 Latest & Greatest New Record Music Charts & Hit Song Lists, Encyclopedia & Reviews
description:
Best R&B & Soul Albums is the FREE app that gives you information on the Top 100 R&B albums currently dominating the charts. Features:

*** LATEST R&B CHARTS downloaded
*** DETAILED ENCYCLOPEDIC ALBUM INFO for the Top 100 albums
*** LISTEN to the songs by linking to iTunes

Check out our other apps:
- Best Hip Hop & Rap Albums
- Best Pop Albums
- Best Music Albums

- Best Rock Albums

- 2009's Best Hip Hop Albums
- 2009's Best R&B Albums
